MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to replace faulty equipment, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:40pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:40pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:22pm on the 24th of April 2021
